publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2773 Malcolm Chisholm: Charities and Trustee Investment (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Charities and Trustee Investment (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Johann Lamont*
S2M-2773 Malcolm Chisholm:Charities and Trustee Investment (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Charities and Trustee Investment (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Johann Lamont

S2M-2773 Malcolm Chisholm: Charities and Trustee Investment ( Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Charities and Trustee Investment ( Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Johann Lamont
